gdpr.description: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience and analyze performance. By continuing, you consent to our

features.title: Enterprise Features
features.mainHeading: Everything you need for popup success
features.description: Powerful enterprise-grade tools to create, manage, and optimize your website popups. Boost engagement and conversions with our comprehensive solution.

management.title: Centralized Management
management.description: Manage all your website popups from one intuitive dashboard. Create, edit, and track performance effortlessly.

types.title: Multiple Popup Types
types.description: Choose from various popup types: notifications, email collectors, and promotional messages to match your goals.

targeting.title: Smart Targeting
targeting.description: Target visitors based on behavior, timing, and location. Show the right message at the right time.

advancedFeatures.title: Advanced Capabilities
advancedFeatures.description: Take control of your popup strategy with advanced features designed to maximize engagement and conversion rates

builder.title: Visual Builder
builder.description: Create stunning popups with our intuitive drag-and-drop interface

analytics.title: Smart Analytics
analytics.description: Track performance with detailed analytics and insights

timing.title: Smart Timing
timing.description: Perfect timing based on user behavior and triggers

integrations.title: Integrations
integrations.description: Connect with your favorite marketing tools

testimonials.title: Customer Success
testimonials.description: Discover how enterprises are improving their conversion rates with our popup management platform

items.name: Sarah Thompson
items.quote: The drag-and-drop interface makes it incredibly easy to manage our popup campaigns. Weve seen a 40% increase in email signups.

items.name: Alex Rivera
items.quote: The detailed analytics and smart targeting features have transformed our popup strategy. Weve seen incredible engagement rates since switching.

items.name: David Chen
items.quote: Finally, a popup solution thats both powerful and easy to use. The targeting options are exactly what we needed.

items.description: Popups displayed daily across thousands of websites
Active enterprise websites using our platform

cta.heading: Ready to transform your popup strategy?
cta.description: Join thousands of successful businesses using our enterprise-grade popup solution

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.heading: Choose your perfect plan
pricing.description: Simple, transparent pricing that grows with you. Try any plan free for 30 days.

integration.title: Website Integration
integration.description: Follow these steps to integrate popups into your website

step1.title: Add the script to your website
step1.description: Copy and paste this code into the <head> section of your website.

step2.title: Verify Installation
step2.description: After adding the code, your popups will automatically appear on your website based on your configuration.

checklist.title: Installation Checklist
items: Script is added to the head section
